Plot: Bigfoot has come to the town of Ellwood City, PA and is causing BIG problems. Now it's up to four town locals, Chuck (Curt Wootton), Dale (Nathan Magill), Burl (Jared Show) and Kate (Joanie Dodds) to take him down.
Title: Bigfoot the Movie
Actors: Curt Wootton, Joanie Dodds, Jared Show, Nate Magill
